text: Mashenka () is a 1942 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.Машенька (1942) It stars Valentina Karavayeva, Mikhail Kuznetsov, and D. Pankratova. == Actors == * Valentina Karavayeva - Mashenka Stepanova * Mikhail Kuznetsov - Alexei "Alyesha" Soloviev * D. Pankratova - Klava * Vera Altayskaya - Vera * Georgi Svetlani - Uncle Vasya * Nikolai Gritsenko - Kolya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1942 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman
title: Mashenka (1942 movie)
